contentrichtext.text: <!--uncomment if needed ''For the current|defunct federal|provincial electoral district, see [[Okanagan Centre (electoral district)]]'' ---> '''Okanagan Centre''' was a federal [[electoral district (Canada)|electoral district]] in [[British Columbia]], [[Canada]], that was represented in the [[Canadian House of Commons]] from 1988 to 1997. This riding was created in 1987 from parts of [[Okanagan North]] and [[Okanagan—Similkameen]], and eliminated in 1996 when it was merged into [[Kelowna—Lake Country|Kelowna]]. Okanagan Centre consisted of the [[Regional District of Central Okanagan, British Columbia|Central Okanagan Regional District]]. ==Election results== {{Canadian election result/top|CA|1993|percent=yes|change=yes}} {{CANelec|CA|Reform|[[Werner Schmidt]]|30,653|46.62%|}} {{CANelec|CA|Liberal|Murli Pendharkar|15,667|23.83%|}} {{CANelec|CA|PC|[[Al Horning]]|12,608|19.18%|}} {{CANelec|CA|NDP|Bryan Mciver|4,556|6.93%|}} {{CANelec|CA|National|Jack Davis|1,080|1.64%|}} {{CANelec|CA|Green|David Hughes|665|1.01%|}} {{CANelec|CA|Natural Law|Douglas Walker|208|0.32%|}} {{CANelec|CA|Canada Party|Faye Stroo|179|0.27%|}} {{CANelec|XX|Independent|Trevor L. Adams|134|0.20%|}} {{Canadian election result/total|Total valid votes|65,750|100.00%|}} <!-- {{Canadian election result/total|Total rejected ballots|–| }} --> <!-- {{Canadian election result/total|Turnout|–| }} --> {{end}} {{Canadian election result/top|CA|1988|percent=yes|change=yes}} {{CANelec|CA|PC|[[Al Horning]]|19,485|37.25%|}} {{CANelec|CA|NDP|Bryan Mciver|15,800|30.21%|}} {{CANelec|CA|Liberal|Murli Pendharkar|8,922|17.06%|}} {{CANelec|CA|Reform|[[Werner Schmidt]]|7,599|14.53%|}} {{CANelec|CA|Green|David Hughes|496|0.95%|}} {{Canadian election result/total|Total valid votes|52,302|100.00%|}} <!-- {{Canadian election result/total|Total rejected ballots|–| }} --> <!-- {{Canadian election result/total|Turnout|–| }} --> {{end}} == See also == * [[List of Canadian federal electoral districts]] * [[Past Canadian electoral districts]] == External links == *[http://www2.parl.gc.ca/Sites/LOP/HFER/hfer.asp?Language=E&Search=Det&Include=Y&rid=934 Riding history from the] [[Library of Parliament]] [[Category:Defunct British Columbia federal electoral districts]]
